summary: This mod tries to bring back some element of Acrobatics/Athletics in Oblivion and add perks which increase jump height, run speed, etc, whilst merging with the current Stealth tree.
descriptionHtml:
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Acrobatics Perks:

Acrobatics Perks adds more perks onto the existing stealth skill tree. It adds 8 new perks that are fully working and tested. I am planning to add more perks and maybe sort out getting a proper skill tree. This is still a work in progress whilst I add more to it, but everything that is in the mod at the moment is working as intended.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------



NOTICE: Some perks require the latest version of SKSE (Skyrim Script Extender) links will be placed below the mod description.


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Why is it merged?:

There is no way I know of to add more skill trees, so it was either replace a tree or add on to an existing one.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

How do I level up my acrobatics?:

At the moment, you can only level it up when your stealth skill levels up. I hope to change this so that you can earn skill points in the same ways you did in Oblivion.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Perks Currently In The Mod:

Speed - 1/2 - You run and sprint 15% faster.
Speed 2/2 - You run and sprint 30% faster.
Expert Landing - You take half the normal damage from falling.
Acrobatic Conditioning 1/2 - Your stamina regnerates 25% quicker
Jump Height - You can now jump much higher.
Acrobatic Conditioning 2/2 - Your stamina regenerates 50% quicker
Finesse - 15% chance to dodge attacks


To add:
Further roll distance
Attack Jumping
Choose jump height %
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Any feedback is appreciated. Please leave a comment with what perks you want added / changed and any suggestions for improvements. Thanks!


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
